preqs: FIT1013 or FIT1002 or (FIT1040 AND a second level programming unit - one of FIT1008, FIT1035, FIT2029, FIT2034, FIT2071, FIT2076, FIT2081 or equivalent)

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT1002, FIT1013} or  (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT1040} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {FIT1008, FIT1035, FIT2029, FIT2034, FIT2071, FIT2076, FIT2081}))

description: This unit focuses on the design, construction and deployment of mobile applications, with particular focus on Android and iOS platforms. Areas such as mobile data management and networking, MVC design patterns, and mobile GUI design considerations will be explored. The unit will emphasise hands-on, practical experience with actual devices and emulators.
